item.description: for any of you, who will be alone on Christmas, my friends are putting on a dinner buffet at the Knights of Columbus in Salem, NH from 12:30-3:30pm. they have food for 150 people and last year I went, and the food was great! There is no cost, but I would recommend getting there early. I will be there at 12:15, knowing my dad, as seating is limited, but it does go on for 3 hours. The K of C is located at 37 Main Street (exit 2 off route 93) Salem, NH. Merry Christmas to all of you, and many more are wished for you and yours' ;) hugs, susan
item.name: Free Christmas Dinner Buffet...
